body:
This commit:
1. Adds the URL and checksum for the tarball for sundials-5.0.0
2. Modifies the cmake flags for the `+fcmix` variant to `-DF77_INTERFACE_ENABLE`
3. Adds a new variant `+f2003` that enables the Fortran 2003 bindings by setting `-DF2003_INTERFACE_ENABLE` as well as `-DFortran_INSTALL_MODDIR`
4. Adds a new variant `+examples-f03` that installs Fortran 2003 examples by setting `-DEXAMPLES_ENABLE_F2003`
title: sundials: Added v5.0.0 and Fortran 2003 options to package
